title: 3 Easy Ways to Minimize YouTubes With Picture In Picture

steps.title: Enable picture-in-picture on your Android device.
steps.content: Enable picture-in-picture on your Android device. This feature allows you to continue playing videos on the YouTube app while it is minimized. [1] X Research source Do the following: Go to Settings . Select Apps & notifications . Select Advanced . Select Special app access . Select Picture-in-picture . Select YouTube . Select Allow picture-in-picture .

steps.title: Enable picture-in-picture on your YouTube.
steps.content: Enable picture-in-picture on your YouTube. This feature must also be turned on in the YouTube app itself. Do the following: Open the YouTube app. Tap your profile picture. Tap the cog icon. Tap Playback . Toggle on Picture-in-picture .

steps.title: Play a video in the YouTube app.
steps.content: Play a video in the YouTube app. You can use the search bar to find specific videos or playlists , or you can browse your feed.

steps.title: Switch to another app.
steps.content: Switch to another app. If you return to your home screen, or if you open another app, YouTube should be minimized in a mini player. To move the screen, tap and drag it elsewhere. To close the mini player, tap the X . You can also return to the YouTube app to stop the video.

steps.title: Enable picture-in-picture on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Enable picture-in-picture on your iPhone or iPad. This feature allows you to continue playing videos on the YouTube app while it is minimized. Do the following: Open Settings . Tap General . Tap Picture in Picture . Toggle on Start PiP Automatically .

steps.title: Enable picture-in-picture on your YouTube.
steps.content: Enable picture-in-picture on your YouTube. This feature must also be turned on in the YouTube app itself. Do the following: Open the YouTube app. Tap your profile picture. Tap the cog icon. Tap Playback . Toggle on Picture-in-picture .

steps.title: Play a video in the YouTube app.
steps.content: Play a video in the YouTube app. You can use the search bar to find specific videos or browse your feed.

steps.title: Switch to another app.
steps.content: Switch to another app. If you return to your home screen, or if you open another app, YouTube should be minimized in a mini player. To move the screen, tap and drag it elsewhere. To close the mini player, tap the X . You can also return to the YouTube app to stop the video.

steps.title: Open a video on https://www.youtube.com/.
steps.content: Open a video on https://www.youtube.com/ . You can use any web browser. Use the search bar to find specific videos or browse your feed.

steps.title: Hover your cursor over the video.
steps.content: Hover your cursor over the video. An icon will appear in the video.

steps.title: Click the picture-in-picture icon.
steps.content: Click the picture-in-picture icon. This looks like a big square with an arrow pointing to a smaller square. The picture-in-picture window will open.

steps.title: View the picture-in-picture window.
steps.content: View the picture-in-picture window. The player controls are similar to the controls in normal mode. To resize the window, drag one corner of the window outwards to increase the size or inwards to decrease the size. To move the window, click and drag the video. To close picture-in-picture mode, hover over the window and click the X .
